Html:
I'm getting an InvalidOperationException of "'DeferRefresh' is not allowed during an AddNew or EditItem transaction" when using a DataGrid in the RowDetails of another DataGrid.  Its a master detail scenario and when I click too quickly on anythign after editing a child item the exception is thrown. 

When running the sample below if you double-click on the open cell below "Child Name" and then quickly click on the Name column header above "parent one" the exception is thrown.

I'm looking for suggestions about why the exception is thrown and how I can protect against it. 

Xaml:

<Window x:Class="WpfApplication1.Window1"
    xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
    xmlns:toolkit="clr-namespace:Microsoft.Windows.Controls;assembly=WpfToolkit"
    x:Name="window"
    Title="Window1" Height="300" Width="300">
    <Grid>
        <toolkit:DataGrid x:Name="dataGridParents" AutoGenerateColumns="False" SelectionMode="Single" IsSynchronizedWithCurrentItem="True" ItemsSource="{Binding ElementName=window, Path=Parents}">
            <toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
                <toolkit:DataGridTextColumn Header="Name" Binding="{Binding Name}"/>
            </toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
            <toolkit:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
                <DataTemplate>
                    <Grid Width="Auto" Margin="30,0,0,0">
                        <toolkit:DataGrid x:Name="dataGridChildren" InitializingNewItem="dataGridChildren_InitializingNewItem" AutoGenerateColumns="false" SelectionMode="Single" ItemsSource="{Binding ElementName=dataGridParents, Path=SelectedItem.Children}" BorderBrush="{x:Null}">
                            <toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
                                <toolkit:DataGridTextColumn Header="Child Name" Binding="{Binding Name}"/>
                            </toolkit:DataGrid.Columns>
                        </toolkit:DataGrid>
                    </Grid>
                </DataTemplate>
            </toolkit:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
        </toolkit:DataGrid>
    </Grid>
</Window>

Code Behind:

using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Windows;
using System.Windows.Controls;
using System.Windows.Data;
using System.Windows.Documents;
using System.Windows.Input;
using System.Windows.Media;
using System.Windows.Media.Imaging;
using System.Windows.Navigation;
using System.Windows.Shapes;

namespace WpfApplication1
{
    public class Person : System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
    {
        public event System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventHandler PropertyChanged;

        private string _name;
        private Person _parent;
        private System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person> _children = new System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person>();

        public string Name
        {
            get { return _name; }
            set
            {
                if (_name != value)
                {
                    _name = value;
                    if (PropertyChanged != null)
                    {
                        PropertyChanged(this, new System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs("Name"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        public Person Parent
        {
            get { return _parent; }
            set
            {
                if (_parent != value)
                {
                    _parent = value;
                    if (PropertyChanged != null)
                    {
                        PropertyChanged(this, new System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs("Parent"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }

        public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person> Children
        {
            get { return _children; }
            set 
            {
                if (_children != value)
                {
                    _children = value;
                    if (PropertyChanged != null)
                    {
                        PropertyChanged(this, new System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs("Children"));
                    }
                }
            }
        }

    }

    /// <summary>

    /// Interaction logic for Window1.xaml

    /// </summary>

    public partial class Window1 : Window
    {
        public Window1()
        {
            InitializeComponent();
        }

        private System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person> _parents = 
            new System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person>() { new Person(){Name="parent one"}, new Person(){Name="parent two"} };

        public System.Collections.ObjectModel.ObservableCollection<Person> Parents
        {
            get { return _parents; }
        }

        private void dataGridChildren_InitializingNewItem(object sender, Microsoft.Windows.Controls.InitializingNewItemEventArgs e)
        {
            Person child = e.NewItem as Person;
            if (child != null)
            {
                Person parent = (Person)dataGridParents.SelectedItem;
                child.Parent = parent;
            }
        }
    }
}

Exception:

  Source="PresentationFramework"
  StackTrace:

I'm still looking for help on this one.  On the June release I still get the exception.
